migrations.description: Use minimal config for tasksRunnerOptions
migrations.name: 17.0.0-use-minimal-config-for-tasks-runner-options

migrations.description: Migration for v17.0.0-rc.1
migrations.name: rm-default-collection-npm-scope

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 17.3.0-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Updates nx.json to disabled adding plugins when generating projects in an existing Nx workspace
migrations.name: 18.0.0-disable-adding-plugins-for-existing-workspaces

migrations.description: Moves affected.defaultBase to defaultBase in `nx.json`
migrations.name: move-default-base-to-nx-json-root

migrations.description: Updates the default workspace data directory to .nx/workspace-data
migrations.name: 19-2-0-move-graph-cache-directory

migrations.description: Explicitly set 'updateBuildableProjectDepsInPackageJson' to 'true' in targets that rely on that value as the default.
migrations.name: explicitly-set-projects-to-update-buildable-deps

migrations.description: Remove invalid options (strict, noInterop) for ES6 type modules.
migrations.name: 16-8-2-update-swcrc

migrations.description: Remove deprecated build options
migrations.name: update-17-0-0-remove-deprecated-build-options

migrations.description: Add webpack.config.js file when webpackConfig is not defined
migrations.name: update-17-2-1-webpack-config-setup

migrations.description: Rename workspace rules from @nx/workspace/name to @nx/workspace-name
migrations.name: update-17-2-6-rename-workspace-rules

migrations.description: Migrate no-extra-semi rules into user config, out of nx extendable configs
migrations.name: update-19-1-0-rename-no-extra-semi

migrations.description: Add test-setup.ts to ignored files in production input
migrations.name: add-test-setup-to-inputs-ignore

migrations.description: Move jest executor options to nx.json targetDefaults
migrations.name: move-options-to-target-defaults

migrations.description: Remove tsconfig.e2e.json and add settings to project tsconfig.json. tsConfigs executor option is now deprecated. The project level tsconfig.json file should be used instead.
migrations.name: update-16-3-0-remove-old-tsconfigs

migrations.description: Update to Cypress v13. Most noteable change is video recording is off by default. This migration will only update if the workspace is already on Cypress v12. https://docs.cypress.io/guides/references/migration-guide#Migrating-to-Cypress-130
migrations.name: update-16-8-0-cypress-13

migrations.description: Update to Cypress ^13.6.6 if the workspace is using Cypress v13 to ensure workspaces don't use v13.6.5 which has an issue when verifying Cypress.
migrations.name: update-cypress-version-13-6-6

migrations.description: Replace @nrwl/node:webpack and @nx/node:webpack with @nx/webpack:webpack for all project targets
migrations.name: update-16-3-1-update-executor

migrations.description: Replace @nx/node:node with @nx/js:node for all project targets
migrations.name: update-16-4-0-replace-node-executor

migrations.description: Remove patched eslint rule for @next/next/no-html-link-for-pages
migrations.name: update-17-2-7

migrations.description: Remove @types/react-router-dom from package.json
migrations.name: remove-types-react-router-dom

migrations.description: Add @babel/core to package.json if @babel/preset-react is present
migrations.name: add-babel-core

migrations.description: Add @nx/react types to tsconfig types array
migrations.name: update-16-7-0-add-typings

migrations.description: Add NX_MF_DEV_SERVER_STATIC_REMOTES to inputs for task hashing when '@nx/webpack:webpack' is used for Module Federation.
migrations.name: add-module-federation-env-var-to-target-defaults
